title: What kind of processor do Raspberry Pi have? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Raspberry Pi 2 uses a Broadcom BCM2836 SoC with a 900 MHz 32-bit quad-core ARM-Cortex-A7 processor, with 256 KB shared L2 cache. The Raspberry Pi 3 uses a Broadcom BCM2837 SoC with a 1.2 GHz 64-bit quad-core ARM-Cortex-A53 processor, with 512 KB shared L2 cache. For more about Raspberry Pi feel free to message me Kushal Sharma (कुशल शर्मा)
